Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Pxt-2 (Leu-rich; natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals, XXA, UCLL1c; Other peptides Pxt-1; Pxt-3; Pxt-4, Pxt-5, Pxt-6, Pxt-7, Pxt-11: inactive MIC>100 uM)
Sequence Information.Source: Western clawed frog,Silurana tropicalis, (formerly) Xenopus tropicalis, West Africa

Literature Information.Literature: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of this peptide most resembles (87.5% similarity)PFQa-St2, which contains two additional amino acids GK at the C-terminus. Active against E. coli (MIC 33.5 uM) and S. aureus (MIC 6.5 uM). Updated 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Shigeri Y, Yasuda A, Hagihara Y, Nishi K, Watanabe K, Imura T, Inagaki H, Haramoto Y, Ito Y, Asashima M. 2015
Literature Information.Title: Identification of novel peptides from amphibian (Xenopus tropicalis) skin by direct tissue MALDI-MS analysis
